column4: Hi - can someone tell me how to configure firefox so I can open .rar files direct from the browser?  i.e  not having to save, go to directory
when you click on the file, click "open with" not "save as"

Yeah - that's what I would generally do.  I highlight "Open with archive manager (default)" but get the error message: archive.rar could not be opened because the associated helper application does not exist etc.
